Basic_movement: Press Up, Down, Right, Left to move
Get_hat_from_ingroup: Get the hat from the ingroup
Get_necklace_from_ingroup: Get the necklace from the ingroup
Farm_tile: Farm with your hoe 				 Go to your group farm 				 Tab to switch tool 				 I to open inventory 				 Left Click to farm
Plant_crop: Plant a crop 					 Left Shift to change seed 				 Right Click to plant
Go_to_bed: Go to your house, to the left above the 			 farm. 						 Stand on the green carpet 						 and press the space bar to start a new 			 day. 						 Look how the vegetables have grown!
Go_to_forest_and_hit_tree: Go to the forest and hit a tree
Interact_with_ingroup_member: Interact with an ingroup member 				 E to show or hide emojis  				 Right and Left to change selected emoji 				 Space to show emoji
Walk_around_outgroup_farm_and_switch_to_: Walk around on the outgroup farm 			 and switch to the outgroup
Go_to_market_and_buy/sell_something: Go to the market and buy or sell something 				 Up and Down to select 				 Space to sell or buy 				 Esc to exit
Go_to_minigame_map_and_play: Go to the minigame area 			 and play the minigame
Tutorial_end: Well done. Since you completed 			 the tutorial, the real game will begin ! 		 .						 Space to continue
